name: Buy Low Sell High
description:
Buy Low Sell High is a stock market game with a simple goal: make as much money as possible. With over 40 unique companies and 8 industries to choose from, there are plenty of ways to make your money. However markets can be unpredictable.. use news stories to pick up on market trends to get ahead of the curve on upcoming price changes. Good luck and get rich!

Earnings
View your earnings changing in real time to get immediate feedback on which investments are making you money, and which ones are costing you.

Purchase History
Every decision you make is logged so you can go back and review how your stocks have done over the course of the game.

Stock Events
Each stock has unique news stories that spark price changes and will affect long term trends for the company

Market Events
Playing the market is a gamble because of its unpredictability. Market trends change over time smart investors learn how to predict which way the market is heading.

Develop your skills
This market is more simple and easy to learn then trading in real markets, but a lot of the same principles apply and this makes for good practice before investing real money.
